biggest concern is low sodium so try to add salt once the dish is done to adult portions if needed but leave the kiddos without salt this also goes for high sodium packaged and already prepared foods mrs dash has some really yummy no salt seasoning mixes they can have some spicy stuff if they like it too would probably wait on super spicy stuff but when was less than year old my dad was peeling spicy crawfish for me and would go nuts for them but in general herbs spices and flavoring is anything to shy from unless they have bad time with something ve vaguely heard of bfing moms needing to
